pr_title: Adjust Couchbase version compatibility to only 2.x

timeline.message:
Adjust version compatibility to only 2.x

They recently released 3.0.0 which is not compatible with our instrumentation.

timeline.bodyText: Maybe latest dep test should be updated to 2.7+ below?
timeline.author: mar-kolya

timeline.bodyText: latestDepTestCompile group: 'com.couchbase.client', name: 'java-client', version: '2.6+' - this seems wrong below
timeline.author: mar-kolya
